name: Clockwork Climber
description:
Made for Ludum Dare and the theme is 'Stuck in a Loop'.

You play Aeternum, a clockwork robot, whose job it is to fix the looping music at the top of the tower.
Reach the top of the tower by using Aeternum's ability to slow down the music loop and the clockwork machinery with it.

Controls:
A - Move Left
D - Move Right
Space - Jump
L Shift - Time Slow
